name: Sentinel Diffusion
description:
Sentinel Diffusion v1.0

The model is mainly designed to output art with vivid colors, fine details, and a realistic touch, free from the heavy anime bias commonly found in some existing models (but still capable of generating good anime style art).

One of the primary objectives of the model was to allow for the generation of impressive outputs with simple prompts while also providing the flexibility to create specific and complex results with the right prompt engineering.

The model can generate a diverse range of content, including

  • Consistent characters

  • Realism

  • Striking landscapes

  • Abstract art

  • Fantasy

  • Sci-Fi

  • And more!
